name: Unbound (MasterfulMonkey)
description:
Escape from Hell! Get out before the cave collapses and all hell breaks loose! Run and use your magic spear to dash to safety. Controls

KeyboardController (Xbox Layout)
RunAD / ArrowsLeft Stick / D-PadJumpW / SpaceA / D-Pad UpDashSpaceBAim
WASD / ArrowsLeft Stick / D-Pad

(debug: K / Select to disable the collapsing wall)

A short platformer made for Ludum Dare 49 centered around dashing and escaping a collapsing cave. Don't let the darkness catch up to you! Run and dash with your magic spear to the exit portal to escape!

Fullscreen is recommended.

Time spent working on this totaled up to less than two days, since I didn't have as much time to work on this as I'd have wished. All art and music were created by me for this jam.

Made in Unity. Source can be found on my GitHub.
